    • addMessage

      public void addMessage(Long fromUser, Long toUser, String messageBody, LocalDateTime sentDate)
      Adds a new message in the application, the id will be generated automatically
      Parameters:
      fromUser - the id of the user that sent the message
      toUser - the id of the user that received the message
      messageBody - the body of the message
      sentDate - the date when the message was sent
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if the message is invalid
      ServiceException - if the message could not be added
